runs.comm: outswinging yorker outside of and he gets off the mark by squirting it down to third man
shows his confidence there! The ball swings in on middle, he stays at the crease and clips him effortlessly over midwicket, not a bad ball at all, just a really good shot
feeds him on the pads, swinging in towards leg stump and he gently tickles it on its way to fine leg
he goes the other way this time! Malinga fires a low full toss outside off and Farhat merely had to stay at the crease and push it through the line past cover
appeal for an lbw! Swinging in leg stump, he fails to clip it away and Malinga reckoned that was hitting the stumps, the umpire shakes his head and a good decision because it was missing leg
pushes it softly to the off side
nice delivery to start off with, pitches it up and gets it to move away, beats Hafeez, close call
once again he beats the outside edge, identical deliveries and Haffez doesn't seem to know where his offstump is
drops it short on seeing him use his feet, he pulls but along the ground
tries to launch him over mid-off but misscues it, nevertheless the ball lands well wide of the fielders
makes a bit of room and lofts him square this time, just beats the infield and there's enough on it to reach the fence
Fernando seemed to make it a habit of getting a wicket off a new spell, not this time though, Hafeez safely knocks it to the off side
drops it short and he pulls along the ground, perhaps didn't time it as well as he would have liked, but he found the gap alright
cranks up the pace and tucks him up for room, Hafeez defends
short and he pulls again and not well timed, pretty well placed in the end because it was well short of fine leg
best ball of the innings so far, phew! Beats Farhat for pace, the ball fizzes past the edge and the stumps, 146 kph
gets beside the line and taps it to the off side
that's the Hafeez we know! Gets a bit of width outside off and he cuts it away easily wide of backward point
width again and he gets beside the line and slices it square, third man picks it up
stays back and defends back to the bowler
nips back in and traps him high on the pad, half appeal from Perera
fetches it from the off stump and tries to hoick it to the on side, he mistimes the shot but manages to pick up a couple

Perera appeals full throttle this time for a lbw and he gets his man! Nips back in sharply from outside off and traps him at the crease, Hafeez seems unhappy and appears to show his bat, or was it off his follow through, I'm not sure
142 kph, he's beaten him for pace again, Farhat not moving his feet
risky run, he pushes it in front of mid-off and a direct hit would have sent him back
excellent effort by Perera in the deep, Shafiq clips it down to deep square leg, Perera gives the chase, pulls it back but the ball rolls back to the rope, the umpire consults the replays
nips back in and hits him high on the pads and there's another appeal
bangs it short and he ducks under it
drives straight to cover, seemed like he chipped it on the full
wide outside off and he tries to cut
steers him straight to short third man
soft dismissal there! Farhat stayed at the crease and tried to loft him downtown over long-on, didn't get the distance and Perara took the catch several yards in front of the rope
that was just too wide, poor ball and he reaches out and crashes it off the front foot wide of sweeper cover
the carrom ball, stays back and defends
comes down the track to smack him over long-on but he checks his shot
gets on his knee and paddles him down to long leg
forces him down to long-on
not too sure what he was trying to do! He gave himself room but played all around it and lost his leg stump, now the game is wide open
softly nudges it wide of fine leg to get off the mark
checks his shot, he pushes it back to the bowler
plays with the turn to the on side
clips it behind square on the on side, there's a spring in the step of the fielders
turns it away to the on side for a single
turned to the on side, they're keeping the singles coming
flatter and on the pads, worked to long leg
well fielded off his own bowling
attempts the reverse sweep but finds short third man
knocks it behind square on the on side
drives to short cover
makes room and cuts quite close to the body, he chops it to the off side
turns it behind square on the on side
risks making room but the gamble pays off as he cuts against the turn and takes a single to the sweeper
full on middle and leg, he pushes it down to long-on
turns it to the on side
makes room and tries to bash it down to ground but he hits it back to the bowler
forces it towards long-on
goes right across his stumps to improvise, ends up nudging it down to short fine leg
drives him down to long-on
slides it down the leg side, nearly shaved the edge
makes room early  but decides to steer it to the off side for a single
makes room but the ball skids through, he ends up patting it back to the bowler
keeps him quiet again, nudges it to midwicket
comes down the track and lofts, checks his shot, Misbah trying to break the shackles
that should come as a big relief for this pair! Tossed up and Misbah gets on his knee and slogs him cleanly over deep midwicket
knocks it down to deep square leg and he places it well enough to take a couple
9 off the over already, pushes it down to long-on
turns it straight to midwicket
goes for a mighty slog but the ball lobs off his pads and Sangakkara tries in vain to catch it
heaves him down to wide long-on, good timing but not in the gap he wanted
pushes it fuller and flatter, he knocks it down to square leg
Shafiq unfurls the reverse sweep and he pulls it off, paddles it away and places it just wide of short third man
tucks it to the on side for a single
tries to disturb the bowler's rhythm by shuffling across the stumps he tucks it to the on side
makes room, clears the back leg and lofts down to wide long-off
nurdles it down to short fine leg, these two overs have given Pakistan much needed momentum
walks across his stumps and steers it to the off side, tells his partner to stay back
well bowled! Bowls the leg cutter on seeing the batsman make room, Misbah expects a wide but it was within the line outside  off
nudges it down to short fine leg and he takes a sharp single, a direct hit towards the batsman;s end would have sent him back
drives him down to long off
another leg cutter, well bowled as Misbah can only chop it back to the bowler
walks right across his stumps but Misbah's is foxed by another slower ball, he can only nudge it away, excellent over
bowls the slower one straight up, he chops it to the off side, Shafiq wanted the run and charged off but had to scamper back
slower one again and Misbah is struggling to time it through the off side, he just about makes his ground, lucky though it wasn't a direct hit at the bowler's end
makes room and ends up swatting it over the bowler's head, mistimed again
that's well bowled, bowls the quicker, short one, the batsman makes room to upper cut it but can't make contact

the most bizarre dismissal of the day so far! Shafiq makes room to hoick him over the on side, doesn't pick the slower ball, the ball hits his body and dribbles back towards the stumps, Shafiq has no clue where the ball is, looks back to see the off bail on the pitch
steers it towards point and there's a bit of a misfield
misdirects the slower ball outside off, loopy full toss really wide outside off, he doesn't attempt a shot
makes room and squeezes it behind square on the off side
the slower ball and he gets on his knee and clubs him over midwicket but can't find the gap
foxes him with another leg cutter, he makes room to slice it but fails to make contact
another wide really wide outside the off stump, Perera's been a little inconsistent with the slower balls
stays at the crease and punches a legcutter down to point
charges down the track and tries to smack him over the off side but he's restricted by another slower ball
Afridi makes room and punches this with all his might down to sweeper cover, runs hard to complete the second
well played! He moves across his stumps early and picks that gap at long leg, he knew fine leg was a bit fine and he used the pace to work it away
another Misbah special! He makes room and plays an elegant square drive past extra cover, looked so stylish, he put in a lot of power on that shot and the fielder in the deep dived in vain
slower ball this time and he tapped it to the off side for a single
taps it to the off side to Dilshan and they don't risk a run

well bowled again, he taps it to the off side and he decides against the single, Afridi's a bit slow in dragging his bat back in and there's a direct hit, they take an overthrow, it's touch and go and Afridi gets a breather, he gets the benefit of the doubt
and Misbah relieves the pressure at the end of the over! Low full toss and Misbah moves across the stumps and helps it on its way down to the vacant spaces at deep square leg
and Malinga sprays it so wide outside off that you needed two bats to chase that
slower ball and patted down to point for a quick single
swings it away and Misbah reaches out and just beats the fielder on the off side, long-off runs across to pick it up
that's more like it from Malinga, yorker outside off and awkwardly squirted away byvMisbah
another yorker outside off and squeezed to the off side, SL won't mind that single
keeps it on the stumps on a good length and Afridi hoicks him across the line behind square
super comeback by Malinga, full and outside off, too quick for Misbah to even squirt it out
if only you could listen to the crowd roar! Fernando makes the mistake of dropping a slower ball on a good length, he swings it from the off stump and clubs it over wide long-on
Afridi attempts another hoick but he swishes at thin air, this was further away from the off stump

this was going going, don't know where it is! Slower ball and fuller this time, Afridi uses all his muscle behind this slog and biffs it over deep midwicket, talk about power. And they've lost the ball, thought so. It landed on the crowd, not a bad souvenir to keep!
good comeback, Fernando fires a fuller ball and beats Afridi for pace, well bowled
makes room and carves a full ball over extra cover, not enough power to take it down to the rope

is there a twist here? Fernando pitches it up and Afridi makes room and goes for the slog again, gets a thin outside edge and Sangakkara laps it up. It's amazing how the sound of that edge overshadowed the din here at the stadium

6 runs and overthrows! Misbah makes room and squirts it down to the off side,  they take two and Angelo's throw was to the batsman's end, Sangakkara over ran the ball and he failed to gather it, no back up and to raced away to fine leg
well bowled, yorker outside off, he turns the bat and just manages to beat Malinga

Pakistan have done it! Bit of drama there as Malik squirted out a yorker and got a thick outside edge down to third man, Malinga went up in appeal thinking it struck his boot in front of off stump, Malinga was pretty upset his appeal was turned down but by then they had completed two runs, in fact they ran three, just in case!
